document_data.name: Harimmon
document_data.mainbody: '''Harimmon''' was one of the river ports along the coast of the [[Sword River]] in the [[Sword Lands]], [[Laerakond]].
document_data.Description: Harimmon was built around an old, semi-ruined castle.
document_data.Background: As of [[1479 DR]], Harimmon was a decandent town crowded with shady dealers. The town seemed to attract a lot of sellswords, rumors, and stolen goods.
document_data.Notable Inhabitants: * [[Jada Marlserpent]], the last survivor of [[Clan Marlserpent]], and one of the few known [[dragonheir]]s as of 1479 DR.
